product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Tight 'n Toned Pore-Refining AHA+PHA Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingPowerful AHAs are balanced by PHAs to gently exfoliate skin and visibly minimize pores. Pores look smaller and skin looks smoother instantly AND over time. The foam formula feels weightless & comfortable, absorbs quickly and applies easily with just fingers - no cotton rounds needed!
details: DetailsBenefitsPores look smaller instantly & over timeAHAs + PHAs help exfoliateBubbly foam absorbs quickly & applies easily with fingertipsClinically provenDermatologist-testedGentle, non-stripping & non-dryingNon-comedogenicSuitable for all skin types, including sensitive skinPart of Benefit's Pore Care collection - a collection specially developed to help minimize, clear, and smooth the look of poresKey IngredientsAlpha Hydroxy Acids, like glycolic acid & citric acid, and Polyhydroxy Acid gluconolactone, help exfoliate & visibly tighten poresLemon extract helps pores look smallerYuzu extract helps skin feel smootherBisabolol helps skin feel comfortableSphingolipids, ceramide-like molecules, help preserve initial skin hydrationFeaturesAFTER 1 USE, 93% said it visibly tightens pores*AFTER 1 USE, 90% said skin looks toned*AFTER 1 USE, 96% said skin feels refreshed*AFTER 1 MONTH, 91% said pores look smaller**AFTER 1 MONTH, 97% said skin is smoother**AFTER 1 MONTH, 94% said it visibly improves skin texture**AFTER 1 MONTH, 90% said it visibly reduces the look of pores and blackheads over time***Self-evaluation by 115 participants after 1 use**Self-evaluation by 115 participants after 1 monthItem 2606906How To UseTIPS & TRICKS: Lookin' tight!Apply 1-2 pumps to clean face & neck with hands. Use daily AM & PM.Beauty Tip: Save your cotton rounds. This toner is made of foam, so application is fingertip-friendly!IngredientsAqua (Water), Gluconolactone, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citric Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Decyl Glucoside, Bisabolol, Menthoxypropanediol, Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Sphingolipids, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract. No 16420.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Easy, effortless step in my skincare routine
reviews.comments: I love this product. I use it on my face in the morning after cleansing and it really feels like it tightens my mature skin. I love that I can apply it with my fingers and it absorbs into the skin without feeling sticky. 1-2 pumps is all you need and it layers beautifully under serum and moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Magic Foam
reviews.comments: I have no idea what some of these people have against this product cause nothing the negative reviews say is true. Its not sticky especially since its not the last product in your routine. It doesn't smell bad, if anything it just smells like a more medical grade product. It freaking works! Its also super easy to apply and I love the application method. I don't like waste like cotton rounds. This u can just apply with your fingers.

reviews.headline: absolutely NOT
reviews.comments: used it once after my regular facial cleansing, applied all over my face as you would a normal toner and it burned so bad. had to rinse it off immediately and just wait for my skin to stop burning :/

reviews.headline: STINKS AND IS SUPER STICKY
reviews.comments: I was SUPER excited to try this cause I heard some good reviews ... BUT it's crap! Like what a waste of money ! First off it smells terrible then after using just a small amount it left my whole face super sticky afterwards.  I would give it zero stars if I could! Super disappointed

reviews.headline: Yuck
reviews.comments: Left my face sticky

reviews.headline: Not A Repurchase
reviews.comments: What is the purpose of the foaming? Is it meant to be easier, fun maybe? It's honestly more of a hassle because I have to change my routine to accommodate this product. Also the stinging. I'm not new to acids, nor do I have sensitive skin but this toner makes my face sting. Why? Nobody needs this. I love Benefit but they dropped the ball on this one

reviews.headline: Love this toner
reviews.comments: Has a pump top and is dispensed in a foam. Works really well, has really shrunk my pores to microscopic. My only complaint would be that it can sting a bit when applied.

reviews.headline: dont buy
reviews.comments: one of the worst products I've ever bought. did nothing but make my skin sticky and very shiny üòî

reviews.headline: benefit pore
reviews.comments: one of the worst products ever bought by benefit

reviews.headline: I've found my match!
reviews.comments: I love this product because it's clean, light weight, no residue, easy to apply, and it goes a long way.  A little dab on the tip of your finger. After cleaning my face I apply my moisturizer and the product because my skin is super sensitive. This might not be the right order for those professionals but it works for me. My skin is flawless and the pores are invisible. Try it you might like it :) Also, its inexpensive.

reviews.headline: Beware it BURNS
reviews.comments: WHY is no one saying it burns?! I used this after the poreforessional cleanser and i will never do that again. I do have sensitive skin and i have never ever felt this before. Feels like when you put a plumping lip gloss on, but on your face and it didnt go away for who knows how long. It burns as I'm typing this.

reviews.headline: Yes!!!
reviews.comments: My boyfriend told me how smooth my skin was looking after I had been using after a couple weeks

reviews.headline: An okay product
reviews.comments: The product does work, I have seen a change in my pore size, they seem smaller. But no matter how I use this it feels a bit sticky on my face and does has a horrible smell. I know this might not be the casr for everyone, but I did breakout after using this product.

reviews.headline: Nice Product! Strange reviews
reviews.comments:
Some of the comments have me shaking my head. This is a 'Pore' toner‚Ä¶.. we do not have pores in our eyes, therefore, it should not go there, and it won't sting. I have super sensitive skin, and if anything, I found this to be too gentle for a AHA feel. 

It absolutely DOES NOT leave a residue on your face and or do you feel like you put anything on? That's how great it goes into the skin. But toners and specifically this delivery as it is foam, is best applied to damp skin as soon as you are done washing your face. If you've been sitting around for a long time, and your skin is completely dry, then you might feel something. Toners and serums are best. Applied to semi damp skin. Facial water sprays are a great tool if you've not dampened your skin. I find this product left my skin very glow after about six days of use. You can get rid of pours indefinitely. So no product is going to do that, but this product has definitely made my skin look glowy

reviews.headline: LARGE RED BUMPS AND WHITEHEADS
reviews.comments: This product is super sticky. Does not fully absorb into skin. Causes a large amount of whiteheads and large red cysts to appear on my face. I will never use anything from this brand ever again. DO NOT USE if you have sensitive skin or acne prone skin. I guarantee this will BREAK YOU OUT!!! I will probably go back to CERAVE or EUCERIN!! As those lotions did not tend to irritate my face. Seriously, DO NOT fall for it like i did. BIG MISTAKE. I am heart broken by this.

reviews.headline: Works fast and well
reviews.comments: I have noticed from the first application that my pores are visibly smaller. As well, I could feel my skin tightening during the first application. I do use this twice daily as is listed and can tell a major difference in my skin as I have been using this product for a few weeks now. I do wish I would have bought the larger product, but I wanted to see if it was worth it first. I will be buying the larger product when I run out.

reviews.headline: not bad but beware if you have acne or sensitive skin!
reviews.comments:
take this with a grain of salt because i have sensitive skin with a few blemishes here and there. ive been using this for about 6 weeks. when i first started using this product, it would sting REALLY bad on any little blemish i had, even the smallest ones. i continued to use it because i started to see a bit of a difference in my pores, but now it literally burns my whole face, i had to stop using it. 

maybe this would be good if you dont have any acne or you dont have sensitive skin, but i must warn anyone else who does!

reviews.headline: WOW!
reviews.comments: I really like this toner! It does the job and I can wasily see that my pores look smaller! I might have to get the full size!

reviews.headline: Has saved my skin
reviews.comments: I received a travel size of this toner in an iPad bag a while back and I was shocked how quickly I noticed a change in my skin. Within 2 days my acne had significantly improved. I had to buy the full size and I love it!

reviews.headline: Don't use!
reviews.comments:
AHA SHOULD NEVER BE USED WITH PHA
My eyes got burned! Be careful üßê

media.headline: Works great with no cotton pad

faceoff_positive.comments:
As someone who's always on the lookout for new and innovative skincare products, I was immediately intrigued by this foam. Despite my familiarity with AHA-based serums and toners, I'd never before used a foam formula with active ingredients. To my surprise, the foam felt quite pleasant on my skin - light, airy, and not at all heavy or greasy like some other products I've used in the past.

However, as I continued to use the foam over time, I began to wonder if it was as effective at delivering those active ingredients as other products I'd used before. After all, foam-based formulas are often associated with a gentler, more superficial cleansing experience, and I couldn't help but question whether the foam was truly penetrating deep into my skin to deliver the full benefits of its actives.

Additionally, I found myself wanting to wash off the foam after each use - not because it was causing any discomfort or irritation, but simply because of its foam-based nature. I've always been more accustomed to using serums or toners that are meant to be left on the skin, so the idea of leaving a foam on my face just felt a bit odd to me.

All in all, I wouldn't say I had any major complaints about this foam. It felt nice on my skin and didn't cause any negative reactions or irritation. However, given my reservations about its effectiveness and my own personal preferences when it comes to skincare products, I don't think I would choose to repurchase it in the future.
faceoff_positive.headline: Nice Product, wanted to love it!

faceoff_negative.comments:
take this with a grain of salt because i have sensitive skin with a few blemishes here and there. ive been using this for about 6 weeks. when i first started using this product, it would sting REALLY bad on any little blemish i had, even the smallest ones. i continued to use it because i started to see a bit of a difference in my pores, but now it literally burns my whole face, i had to stop using it. 

maybe this would be good if you dont have any acne or you dont have sensitive skin, but i must warn anyone else who does!
faceoff_negative.headline: not bad but beware if you have acne or sensitive skin!
